Module fr.florian.ants.antv
Package fr.florian.ants.antv1.living.ant

Class Ant

java.lang.Object
fr.florian.ants.antv1.living.Living
fr.florian.ants.antv1.living.ant.Ant
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, AntSignalReceiver, Runnable, Flow.Subscriber<AntSignal>
Direct Known Subclasses:
QueenAnt, SoldierAnt, WorkerAnt
public abstract class Ant extends Living implements AntSignalReceiver
Ant class describing the general behavior of an ant
